data: Privacy Policy

Home8alarm ("we", "our", "us") values your privacy and endeavors to treat your personal information with due care and security. Our Privacy Policy sets forth the ways in which we obtain and use your personal information. We reserves the right, without notice, to modify or eliminate all or a portion of this Privacy Policy at any time. By making use of our website or any of our products or services, you agree to the terms of the Privacy Policy in its ongoing form.

We may store the information that you provide. This information may include, for example, your name, mailing address, e-mail address and telephone number, as well as certain interactive data such as the type of browser you use, the files you request, or the domain or IP address you use to access our website(s). If you supply us with personal data or request information from us, we may use your information to respond to your request. You may receive our or third-party email notifications and/or offers relating to products or services in which we believe you may have an interest.

We may collect information directly from you in order to provide products or services, to administer customer service assistance, or to fulfill any legal or regulatory requirements. We may also obtain personal information as a result of your authorized transactions using the product(s) or through a merchant that uses the products and/or services.

We will not sell or trade your personal information to another party and will limit access to your personal information to our employees and business clients for internal use only in providing our products and services to you.
When we obtain personal information as part of our direct relationship with you, we will not share this information with non-affiliated third parties, except in the following circumstances:
In accordance with the Privacy Policy
To facilitate and complete authorized transactions

As part of its products and services, we may create links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices employed by third-party websites that are linked to our website, nor do we control or warrant the utility, merchantability, or workmanship of the products or services offered at third-party websites. Before you supply your personal information to a third-party website, whether or not the third party is a merchant, client, or partner of ours, you should review and understand the applicable privacy policy for that website.

The examples contained in this Privacy Policy are illustrations only, and they are not intended to be all-inclusive. If your account is terminated for any reason or if you become an inactive customer, our Privacy Policy will continue to apply. If you are a merchant using our products or services, this Privacy Policy applies to all accounts you may have with us, and it replaces all our previous disclosures to you about our information practices.
If you have any questions about the Privacy Policy, please contact us using one of the methods available on the "Contact Us" page of our website.
Your Information
Information We Collect

When you sign up for and use the Services, integrate the Services with another application or service (for example, when you connect your Dropbox account with the Services), send us an email, post on our OSTicket, or communicate with us in any way, you are voluntarily giving us information that we collect. By giving us this information, you consent to this information being collected, used, disclosed, transferred to the United States and stored by us, as described in our Terms of Use and in this Privacy Policy.

Cookie Policy
(a) What are cookies?

A cookie is a small data containing a string of characters that is sent to your device/computer when you visit a website. When you visit the website again, the cookie allows that site to recognize your browser.
(b) What kind of cookies are used on this website

(c) Managing your cookie settings?
On accessing any page on this website, a banner which contains a short cookie notice is shown to you. If you continue browsing, you consent to the use of cookies described in this Cookie Policy.

If you do not consent to the use of cookies, you can block them at any time by activating settings on your browser. To find out more information about cookie settings, see http://www.allaboutcookies.org/manage-cookies/index.html.
Please be aware that if cookies are disabled, some website features may not operate as intended.
International Users

We are based in the United States. No matter where you are located, you consent to the processing and transferring of your information in and to the U.S. and other countries. The laws of the U.S. and other countries governing data collection and use may not be as comprehensive or protective as the laws of the country where you live.
